title: Israeli Basketball Premier League Coach of the Year
text: The Israeli Basketball Premier League Coach of the Year, or Israeli Basketball Super League Coach of the Year, is an award given to the best <a href="head%20coach">head</a> <a href="basketball%20coach">coach</a> of each season of the <a href="Israeli%20Basketball%20Premier%20League">Israeli Basketball Premier League</a>, which is the top-tier level men's professional <a href="basketball">basketball</a> league in <a href="Israel">Israel</a>.
